name: get_token_price
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool pancakeswap_api_freemium.
Tool description: All Pancakeswap API ( Feel Free To Ask For More Endpoints )
API description: Retrieves the price of a specified token using the PancakeSwap API.

token.description: The contract address of the token. Defaults to the address of the BUSD token.
